name: paperTrade
short_description:
The intention of this Git repo is to build the track record of my strategy -- a cash neutral long/short global equity strategy which delivers a sharpe ratio about 3 in the past 20 years.

In the beginning of every month, I will publish my paper trade portfolio here. Since Github keeps the timestamp, it can prove that I do not tamper the portfolio after I know the realized returns. Therefore the performance realized later is the real portfolio performance. I will also calculate the performance of the last paper portfolio and publish it here.

The portfolios here are encrypted. But a potential investor (must be an accredited investor) can contact me and I will give the key to decrypt all my past paper portfolios. Then you can verify the performance on your own.

Thanks for visiting!

Bill
dasheng.llc@gmail.com
summary: Tracking records of my investing strategy
